attributes.action: Government to offer economic help to the hospitality industry during COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: As an hospitality worker, I am concerned about my future given the current situation
attributes.background: To give an economic support to all hospitality workers that might lose their job due to the COVID-19 spreading. We all will have to pay rent, bills, etc. and without an income it is just impossible!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302162

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
